text: Pamela Dawber (born October 18, 1951) is an American actress. She is best known for her lead television sitcom roles as Mindy McConnell in Mork & Mindy (1978–1982) and Samantha Russell in My Sister Sam (1986–1988). ==References== Category:1951 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Singers from Detroit Category:Actors from Detroit
title: Pam Dawber
